title: Beijing horticulture expo park to reopen to public
text:
By Xin Wen | chinadaily.com.cn | Updated: 2019-10-20 19:36

The ticket price of Beijing horticulture expo park is set at 20 yuan per person to visit the park. [Photo/VCG]

The park in the Beijing International Horticultural Exhibition in Yanqing district will reopen to the public on Monday, the Beijing Expo 2019 Coordination Bureau said on Sunday afternoon.

Starting from Oct 21, the park will open from 9 am to 4 pm every day. The public landscape area and outdoor space of the expo park will open to the public but all exhibition halls will close.

The ticket price is set at 20 yuan per person to visit the park.

Visitors can buy tickets directly from the expo park gate, according to the bureau.

Set to run from April 29 to Oct 7, the 162-day exhibition has attracted 9.34 million tourists from home and abroad.

Over 110 countries and international organizations have participated in the event to showcase the latest horticulture technologies and 8,000 varieties of plants.
description: The park in the Beijing International Horticultural Exhibition in Yanqing district will reopen to the public on Monday, the Beijing Expo 2019 Coordination Bureau said on Sunday afternoon.
